header.description: (Required) __Enum__. Sets whether to represent [ID prefixes](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/id-prefixes) in response data. Set to `false` when exchanging PAPI data with other APIs.

functionality: Gets the entire rule tree for a property version. See the [Rule Trees](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/rule-trees) section for details on the response object's

api_name: Property Manager API: Update a property's rule tree

header.description: (Required) This corresponds to the `ETag` response header. Passing this value back as `If-Match` in write requests ensures you don't overwrite edits by any other API clients. See [Concurrency control](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/concurrency-control) for details.

(Required) __Enum__. Sets whether to represent [ID prefixes](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/id-prefixes) in response data. Set to `false` when exchanging PAPI data with other APIs.

functionality: To write a rule tree to a property version, make a PUT request to the same resource as the GET

api_name: Property Manager API: Patch a property's rule tree

header.description: (Required) This corresponds to the `ETag` response header. Passing this value back as `If-Match` in write requests ensures you don't overwrite edits by any other API clients. See [Concurrency control](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/concurrency-control) for details.

(Required) __Enum__. Sets whether to represent [ID prefixes](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/id-prefixes) in response data. Set to `false` when exchanging PAPI data with other APIs.

functionality: Selectively modify a rule tree using [JSON patch](http://jsonpatch.com) syntax.  As a component of the larger [Bulk patch a set

api_name: Property Manager API: Get a digest for a property's rule tree
functionality: Gets the rule tree's ETag without the rule tree object. Ordinarily when you [get a rule tree](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/get-property-version-rules), the response includes

api_name: Property Manager API: List rule formats

header.description: (Required) __Enum__. Sets whether to represent [ID prefixes](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/id-prefixes) in response data. Set to `false` when exchanging PAPI data with other APIs.

functionality: Gets a list of available rule formats. Use these dated version strings available in the response's `ruleFormats.items` array to control

api_name: Property Manager API: Get a schema for a rule format
functionality: Get the JSON schema for the given product and rule format, which you can use to validate a rule tree

api_name: Property Manager API: Get a schema for a request
functionality: Fetch the JSON schema for a particular request. Error messages about schema mismatches typically link the schema filename.

api_name: Property Manager API: Search properties or includes

header.description: (Required) __Enum__. Sets whether to represent [ID prefixes](https://techdocs.akamai.com/property-mgr/reference/id-prefixes) in response data. Set to `false` when exchanging PAPI data with other APIs.

functionality: This operation searches includes by name, or properties either by name, hostname, or edge hostname for which they're currently active.
